frameDefinitions: An Event continues at a certain Place through Time.
Short selling, a common financial market concept, involves an Intermediary selling Assets to the Market, having borrowed these Assets from a (generally implicit) Lender.
A Period or Eventuality is related to its Duration.
An Activity takes some Time_length to complete.
The obtaining of a Requirement state of affairs or the presence of a Required_entity is profiled as a prerequisite for the obtaining or occurring of a Dependent state-of-affairs.
A Dependent state-of-affairs has a Requirement as a prerequisite for obtaining or occurring.
frameExamples: Pyongyang agreed to suspend its withdrawal while talks <t>continued</t> with Washington.
He was <t>selling</t> <t>short</t> shares from his brother's company on the NASDAQ and he made a fortune.
The atomic bombings were probably not <t>necessary</t> to win WWII without a mainland invasion of Japan.
listRoleDefinitions: When the <fen>Event</fen> occurs.
Where the <fen>Event</fen> takes place.
The original owner and soon to be <fen>Lender</fen> of the <fen>Assets</fen>.
The financial <fen>Assets</fen> being traded.
The entity that is the borrower to the <fen>Lender</fen> and the seller and later repurchaser to the <fen>Market</fen>.
The aggregate selling place of many types of financial stocks, bond, securities, etc. The <fen>Market</fen> is also a metonym for the people who buy the <fen>Assets</fen>.
This role identifies the time at which the <fen>Intermediary</fen> engages in short selling.
This role identifies the place at which the short selling occurs.

A situation, action or event whose duration is being described.  The <fen>Eventuality</fen> occurs as the External Argument if the adjective is used predicatively, or as the modified noun if the adjective is used attributively:
Sometimes a period of time, rather than an event or state is described.
The amount of time that the <fen>Eventuality</fen>, <fen>Period</fen>, or <fen>Entity</fen> lasts.

An item which is metonymically related to an <fen>Eventuality</fen>.  Some common eventualities that are metonymically entailed are the effect of the entity in its capacity as an instrument and the existence of the entity.
The event which requires some <fen>Time_length</fen> for completion.
The amount of time required for the <fen>Activity</fen>.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Time_length</fen> from the norm.
The individual who performs the <fen>Activity</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> at which the <fen>Activity</fen> takes place.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the state of affairs of the <fen>Requirement</fen> or the presence of the <fen>Required_entity</fen>.
The state-of-affairs that must obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
The state-of-affairs which cannot hold without the <fen>Requirement</fen>.
The entity or state-of-affairs that must be present or obtain in order for the <fen>Dependent</fen> to obtain.
An entity that has to be present for the <fen>Dependent</fen> state of affairs to obtain.
The time at which the <fen>Requirement</fen> is necessary for the <fen>Dependent</fen>.
<fen>Place</fen> denotes a location in which the specified relation between <fen>Requirement</fen> and <fen>Dependent</fen> holds.
listRoleExamples: <fex>This difficult period</fex> lasted only a short while .
If the film lasts <fex>more than one hour</fex> , I ca n't stay .
Believe it or not, but this cake requires <fex>a pound of mild sausage</fex>.
<fex>In the US</fex>, putting this on the agenda requires the political weight and leadership of big city mayors.
<fex>In the US</fex>, the political clout of big city mayors is necessary to put this on the national agenda.
